definitions: Debase (something) by adding an inferior substance.
Mingle (a metal) with a cheaper metal.
Adulterate (a substance) by mixing it with something of lesser value.
examples: Copper is alloyed with zinc to make brass.
His joy was alloyed with a degree of sadness.
The gold was alloyed with a base metal.
They alloyed the silver to make it harder.
